entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, DIMINISHING TO AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
